name: Prison of STONE
description:
You find yourself sitting all by your lonesome in a solitary chamber, your thoughts clouded. Explore the underground bunker and slowly piece together what's happened here, and how to get out.

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,DMOVESHIFTSPRINTC [HOLD]CROUCHEINTERACT

*This game was created for the 'Summer of Shivers' HauntedPS1 game jam. It was made in Unity over the course of a month, and it's also my first game! I hope you enjoy it!*
